pages.text: Let's start with $(thing)Items.$() This is where you go to equip any item relating to the $(thing)Kingdom Keys$() mod. This being Keyblades/Organization XIII weapons, Kingdom Keys specific Armors/Accessories and items (such as Potions, Hi-Potions, Ethers, Elixirs, etc.)
After equiping your Keyblade you can summon it with the summon button (standard button is $(thing)G$() )
